tarot_imply_en: victory, recognition, fame, public success, pride
standalone_past_en: You have recently achieved a victory or gained recognition for your hard work. The applause and admiration from the past validate your capabilities.
standalone_present_en: This is your moment of glory! You are riding the white horse to the finish line amidst cheers. Your success is being broadcast to the world; accept the praise with pride.
standalone_future_en: Victory is just around the corner. You will receive a promotion, an award, or higher acclaim. Your efforts will definitely not go to waste.
reading_summary_preview_en: Past successes have built your reputation today, and this momentum will propel you toward greater victory and widespread recognition in the future.
love_past_en: You successfully won someone's heart or overcame love obstacles beautifully.
love_present_en: Enviable love! Your partner admires you, or everyone roots for you. Singles will attract high-profile admirers.
love_future_en: Love will succeed as hoped. You might debut a partner or announce good news publicly.
career_past_en: You received an award, employee of the month, or hit targets so well you're remembered for it.
career_present_en: Your work impresses the boss and peers. Prepare for promotion or public praise.
career_future_en: You will be a star in your field. Advancement and fame will come running to you.
finance_past_en: You received a bonus or returns that made you grin from ear to ear.
finance_present_en: Finances are improving daily. Success brings satisfying income and stability.
finance_future_en: Career success will transform into wealth. Your reputation will help monetize your skills.
action_prompt_en: Don't be overly humble! Show your work to the world and walk with your head held high.
reflection_question_en: Are you ready to step up to the podium and be the center of attention?
affirmation_en: I am worthy of every success and compliment I receive.
hook_en: Practice your acceptance speech, kitty, because the spotlight is swinging your way!
ritual_2min_en: Stand in a 'Super Hero' pose in front of a mirror. Smile and thank yourself aloud for 2 minutes to summon confidence.
journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the achievement you are most proud of?
If you were to reward yourself today, what would it be?
How do you feel when praised in public?
keywords_shadow: arrogance, egoism, fall from grace, needing validation, envy
image_alt_en: A triumphant cat wearing a laurel wreath riding a white horse through a cheering crowd of other cats holding wands up high.
illustration_prompt_en: A triumphant ginger cat wearing a green laurel wreath riding a adorned white horse, parading through a crowd of cheering cats holding wooden wands with ribbons, confetti falling, bright blue sky, art nouveau style, celebratory.
meta_description_en: Six of Wands Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Victory, fame, and public recognition. Prepare for success and applause.

tarot_imply_en: Inability to move on, Unfinished business, Failed transition, Stuck in the past, Returning to trouble
standalone_past_en: You may have tried to escape problems but failed, or made a mistake by returning to old chaos. Heavy emotional baggage kept your boat from moving forward.
standalone_present_en: Stuck! Rowing in circles. Old problems keep resurfacing endlessly. Travel or relocation might be delayed, or perhaps you simply can't bring yourself to move past the past.
standalone_future_en: If you don't dump the emotional trash, you'll never reach the shore. The future holds prolonged issues, or you'll have to fix the same old problems again.
reading_summary_preview_en: Failed attempts to escape in the past have left you stuck in the present. Without dealing with your emotional baggage, the future will remain in the same loop.
love_past_en: Broke up but couldn't cut ties, or failed to escape a toxic relationship.
love_present_en: Old problems haunt you; arguing about the same old things, or an ex returns to bother you.
love_future_en: Hard to move on; you might have to endure the awkwardness, or the relationship stagnates.
career_past_en: Tried to quit but was persuaded to stay, or changed jobs only to find the same problems worse.
career_present_en: Work thought finished has complications, or a transfer is put on hold.
career_future_en: You might have to redo old work or get stuck in a never-ending project.
finance_past_en: Debts thought cleared resurfaced, or chronic financial issues remained unsolved.
finance_present_en: Finances are stuck; cash flow issues, or using all funds to pay old debts with nothing left.
finance_future_en: Beware of spiraling travel costs or prolonged financial troubles.
action_prompt_en: Stop rowing in circles! Admit the old ways don't work. Find a new exit or ask for help immediately.
reflection_question_en: Why are you hugging the past that hurts you so tightly?
affirmation_en: I release myself from past bonds and move forward.
hook_en: Leaking boat in the ocean... bail water or jump? Choose wisely, kitty.
ritual_2min_en: Write your worries on paper. Soak it in water until it disintegrates (like a sinking ship), then pour it away to symbolize letting problems sink.
journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the heaviest baggage in your heart right now?
What obstacle prevents you from moving forward?
If you never had to go back, how would you feel?
keywords_light: Resilience, facing problems, staying put to fix things, patience, gradual healing
keywords_shadow: Stuck, baggage, no escape, returning to trouble, stormy waters
image_alt_en: A boat taking on water, with swords falling out, and a distressed cat trying to bail water out while looking at a stormy horizon.
illustration_prompt_en: A small wooden boat leaking water in rough seas, six swords sliding dangerously, a distressed grey cat frantically bailing water with a cup, dark stormy clouds overhead, chaotic atmosphere, tarot card style, art nouveau, dark blue and grey tones --ar 2:3
meta_description_en: Six of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Inability to move on, stuck in the past, and delayed travel. Learn how to break the cycle and find a way out.

tarot_imply_en: generosity, charity, sharing resources, balance of power, reciprocity
standalone_past_en: You have either been the beneficiary of timely generosity or the benevolent giver who supported others. These past exchanges established a karmic balance that influences where you stand today.
standalone_present_en: The scales are in your hands. You are currently in a position to share your abundance, or conversely, you are about to receive the support you need. Remember, giving and receiving are just two sides of the same energy flow.
standalone_future_en: Future stability is guaranteed through fair exchanges today. The generosity you show or the gratitude you express now will return to you multiplied, creating a sustainable ecosystem of support.
reading_summary_preview_en: Past acts of kindness have set the stage for a present dynamic of fair exchange, leading to a future enriched by the cyclical flow of generosity.
love_past_en: A relationship dynamic where one person was consistently the giver and the other the taker, creating an imbalance.
love_present_en: There is a healthy flow of support between you and your partner, or one is lovingly supporting the other through a tough time.
love_future_en: Lasting love will require restoring equality so that neither partner feels indebted or overburdened.
career_past_en: You benefited from a generous mentor, or you were the one guiding a junior, building professional karma.
career_present_en: Expect financial backing, a bonus, or valuable resources from a superior or sponsor at work.
career_future_en: Your future success lies in mentorship‚Äîsharing your expertise or resources to lift others up.
finance_past_en: You received a loan or financial gift when you needed it, or you were generous with your wealth.
finance_present_en: You are financially stable enough to share your wealth, donate to charity, or help a friend without hurting your own pocket.
finance_future_en: Investments and charitable acts will pay off; financial energy will circulate freely, bringing prosperity back to you.
action_prompt_en: Give with a joyful heart or receive with gratitude, letting go of any guilt or strings attached.
reflection_question_en: Are you giving to gain control, or receiving without acknowledging the value?
affirmation_en: I give joyfully and receive gratefully, keeping the cycle of abundance flowing.
hook_en: Generosity is a superpower, but only when balanced with wisdom.
ritual_2min_en: Set aside a small sum of money to donate or gift. Hold it in your hands and thank the universe for putting you in a position where you are capable of giving.
journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Who has supported me that I need to thank or repay?
What resource (money/time/skills) can I share right now?
How does it truly feel to be on the receiving end?
keywords_light: generosity, mentorship, charity, sharing, balance, gratitude
keywords_shadow: bad debt, strings attached, superiority, selfishness, dependency
image_alt_en: A wealthy merchant cat dressed in fine velvet robes, holding a small scale in one paw and dropping golden coins into the paws of two smaller, grateful cats.
illustration_prompt_en: A majestic merchant cat in rich velvet robes standing under a stone archway, holding brass weighing scales, dropping golden coins to two smaller hopeful cats sitting below, warm golden lighting, themes of charity and balance, Tarot Art Nouveau style.
meta_description_en: Explore the Six of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover the balance of giving and receiving, generosity, and financial harmony with MeowTarot.

tarot_imply_en: patience, assessment, long-term investment, waiting for harvest, perseverance
standalone_past_en: You have put in the hard work and planted the seeds with dedication. Although the initial effort was exhausting, the foundation you built is solid.
standalone_present_en: This is a moment to pause and assess. Your garden is growing, but you must resist the urge to rush the harvest; instead, evaluate if your current strategy is yielding the desired results.
standalone_future_en: The harvest is approaching. Soon, the fruits of your labor will be ripe for the picking, and the rewards will fully justify the patience and effort you invested.
reading_summary_preview_en: Past dedication has led to a present moment of necessary assessment, ensuring that your continued patience will result in a bountiful harvest in the future.
love_past_en: You have invested significant time and patience into building a relationship or pursuing someone.
love_present_en: You are currently evaluating the relationship, asking yourself if the potential future is worth the wait.
love_future_en: If this connection is right, your patience will be rewarded with tangible stability and happiness.
career_past_en: The project you initiated has already survived its most difficult early phases.
career_present_en: Progress is slow but steady; do not get discouraged just because you haven't reached the finish line yet.
career_future_en: Recognition and success will come in due time‚Äînot instantly, but inevitably.
finance_past_en: You have already set a long-term savings plan or investment strategy in motion.
finance_present_en: Interest and value are accruing slowly; be patient and avoid cashing out prematurely.
finance_future_en: Long-term investments will yield substantial returns; wealth comes from compound growth.
action_prompt_en: Pause your work, step back to look at the big picture, and ask yourself, 'Is this effort still worth it?'
reflection_question_en: Are you waiting with hope, or are you waiting with resignation?
affirmation_en: I trust the timing of my life and wait patiently for my harvest.
timing_hint: Within 7 months or during Taurus season
hook_en: Rome wasn't built in a day, and neither is your empire.
ritual_2min_en: Tend to a real plant or simply visualize watering a garden. As you do, imagine your goals receiving nourishment and growing imperceptibly but surely every single day.
journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which project or relationship feels like it's growing too slowly?
If I wait a little longer, what is the best possible outcome?
How can I enjoy the waiting period instead of just suffering through it?
keywords_shadow: impatience, frustration, bad investment, giving up too soon, laziness
image_alt_en: A gardener cat wearing a straw hat, leaning on a hoe and looking contentedly at a lush vine where seven golden pentacles are growing like grapes.
illustration_prompt_en: A patient gardener cat wearing a rustic straw hat, leaning on a wooden hoe, gazing thoughtfully at a flourishing vine trellis where seven large golden coins hang like ripe fruit, soft warm afternoon sunlight, lush garden background, Tarot Art Nouveau style, earthy tones.
meta_description_en: Explore the Seven of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover the themes of patience, long-term investment, and assessing the fruits of your labor with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: apprenticeship, diligence, mastery, attention to detail, repetitive work
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have dedicated yourself to mastering a skill or working diligently behind the scenes. The repetitive effort of the past has built the solid expertise you possess today.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: Keep your nose to the grindstone! This is not the time for dreaming but for doing. You are refining yourself and your craft through focused, detailed attention.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Mastery awaits. Your accumulated expertise will soon establish you as a true authority in your field, making your work highly sought after and valuable.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past diligence has set the stage for your current focus on refinement, and this consistent effort guarantees a future of recognized mastery and success.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: A relationship built slowly through mutual effort, or a connection that was stable but perhaps a bit routine.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: You are actively 'working' on the relationship, paying attention to the small details to improve the connection.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: The relationship will become durable and high-quality, like a masterpiece that took time to build.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You started as an apprentice or in a junior role where you had to learn the ropes meticulously.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: You are deeply engrossed in your work, focusing on the details to produce flawless results.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: You will become a highly specialized expert, and your compensation will rise to match your skill level.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: Income came from hard work and saving steadily, penny by penny.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Money comes from work, not luck. The harder you work, the more you earn right now.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Financial security is assured because it is built on marketable skills that no one can take away.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Focus on the details and do the task in front of you perfectly, one step at a time.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you just getting the job done, or are you crafting a masterpiece?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I dedicate myself to mastery and find joy in the details.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Talent gets you to the door, but discipline unlocks it.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Perform a simple chore (like washing dishes or folding clothes) with absolute mindfulness and precision. Treat every movement as a meditation on quality.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What skill do I want to master to the level of an expert?
How can I infuse more mindfulness into my daily routine?
What joy do I find in seeing small, incremental progress?

numerology_value.keywords_light: diligence, mastery, craftsmanship, detail, focus, expertise
numerology_value.keywords_shadow: perfectionism, overwork, lack of ambition, boredom, repetitive strain
numerology_value.image_alt_en: A focused tabby cat wearing a craftsman's apron, sitting at a wooden workbench, carefully engraving a star pattern onto a golden coin with a small hammer.
numerology_value.illustration_prompt_en: A diligent tabby cat artisan wearing a leather apron, sitting at a cluttered wooden workbench filled with tools, intensely focused on engraving intricate details onto a golden pentacle, warm workshop lighting, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of concentration.
numerology_value.meta_description_en: Explore the Eight of Pentacles tarot meaning. Learn about the importance of diligence, craftsmanship, and mastering your skills with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.hook_en: Who needs a Prince Charming when you own the castle?
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Buy yourself a beautiful bouquet of fresh flowers. Place them where you can see them and thank yourself for working hard to afford this beauty.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is my definition of 'the good life'?
How can I become more emotionally self-reliant?
What is the next gift I will give myself to celebrate my success?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: independence, luxury, self-sufficiency, success, reward, gratitude
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: isolation, superficiality, financial dependence, showing off, gilded cage
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: An elegant cat wearing a jeweled collar, standing in a lush vineyard filled with ripe grapes. A small bird rests calmly on its paw.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: An elegant white Persian cat wearing a jeweled velvet collar, standing gracefully in a sun-drenched vineyard lush with ripe purple grapes, a small falcon resting calmly on its paw, soft golden hour lighting, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of luxury and peace.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Nine of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover the themes of financial independence, self-reliance, and enjoying the fruits of your labor with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: self-reliance, financial independence, solitary luxury, enjoying fruits of labor, sophistication
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have worked diligently and disciplined yourself in the past, successfully unlocking the independence and security you now possess.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: You are currently living your best life, enjoying the luxury and comfort you created for yourself without needing anyone else to complete you.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Your future holds sustained stability and elegance. You will continue to enjoy the sophisticated lifestyle and personal freedom you have earned.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past discipline has elevated you to a present state of self-made success, ensuring a future where you can maintain this level of joy and abundance with grace.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: You previously chose high-quality solitude over a draining or unsatisfactory relationship.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: If single, you are thriving independently. If coupled, you maintain your own identity and financial freedom within the union.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: True love will not diminish you; you will attract a partner who respects your independence and success.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: Your success wasn't luck; it was built on your own competence and decisive actions.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: You are reaping the rewards of your hard work. It's time to pause, sip some tea, and admire your achievements.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Early retirement or significant passive income is possible, allowing you to step back from the daily grind.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: Smart investments and financial discipline in the past have secured your current comfortable status.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Financial status is excellent! You have enough to treat yourself to luxuries and comforts without guilt.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Wealth remains with you as long as you continue to tend to your financial garden with the same care.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Dress up, buy that desire, and take yourself out on a luxury date immediately.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: What is the joy you can create for yourself without waiting for anyone else to provide it?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I am worthy of the abundance and happiness I have created.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Who needs a Prince Charming when you own the castle?
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Buy yourself a beautiful bouquet of fresh flowers. Place them where you can see them and thank yourself for working hard to afford this beauty.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is my definition of 'the good life'?
How can I become more emotionally self-reliant?
What is the next gift I will give myself to celebrate my success?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: independence, luxury, self-sufficiency, success, reward, gratitude
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: isolation, superficiality, financial dependence, showing off, gilded cage
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: An elegant cat wearing a jeweled collar, standing in a lush vineyard filled with ripe grapes. A small bird rests calmly on its paw.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: An elegant white Persian cat wearing a jeweled velvet collar, standing gracefully in a sun-drenched vineyard lush with ripe purple grapes, a small falcon resting calmly on its paw, soft golden hour lighting, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of luxury and peace.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Nine of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover the themes of financial independence, self-reliance, and enjoying the fruits of your labor with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: lasting wealth, family legacy, long-term stability, generational abundance, retirement
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: Your foundations are incredibly solid, likely stemming from supportive family roots or wise long-term planning in the past that gave you a head start.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: You have reached the pinnacle of material success! You are secure, safe, and surrounded by loved ones (or accumulated assets), like a cat lounging in a grand manor.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Your future holds permanent stability‚Äînot just wealth, but a legacy. You will be able to pass on your abundance and wisdom to future generations.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Strong past foundations enable you to enjoy present prosperity, ensuring that this wealth and stability will branch out into a lasting future legacy.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: A relationship strongly supported by family, or a long-standing bond that feels deeply rooted and familial.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: Love is incredibly stable; discussions about marriage, buying a house, or solidifying the family unit are likely.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: The goal is growing old together, building a warm family life, and accumulating shared assets for the next generation.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You have a history of working in established corporations or being involved in a family business.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: Professional success has hit a peak of stability; it may be time to plan for retirement or set up systems for others to run.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: You will leave a professional legacy or build a business that thrives long after you step down.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: Wealth came from inheritance, family support, or long-term investments finally maturing.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Wealth is shouting! Your financial status is rock solid, with significant assets like real estate or a robust portfolio.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: This wealth is sustainable and transferable; you are securing a future where financial hardship is a thing of the past.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Look beyond yourself to the next generation; plan your legacy or do something that adds long-term value to your family.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: What is the most valuable 'treasure' you want to pass on to the next generation (besides money)?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I build lasting wealth and a legacy of love for generations to come.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: It's not just about getting rich; it's about staying rich for generations.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Clean and arrange a family photo or ancestor altar. Place a silver coin in front of it to show gratitude and attract generational wealth energy.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What does my perfect retirement look like?
What do I want to be remembered for building in this world?
What can I do today to bring joy to my family (or chosen family)?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: legacy, inheritance, abundance, family, tradition, retirement
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: family feud, financial failure, loss of home, burden of tradition, isolation
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: An elderly, wise-looking cat resting on a velvet cushion in a grand library, surrounded by kittens playing with piles of gold coins and heirlooms.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A wise elderly Maine Coon cat resting on a luxurious velvet cushion inside a grand old library filled with ancient books and tapestries, three playful kittens rolling around in piles of gold coins on the Persian rug, warm fireplace glow, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of heritage.
#DAA520
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Ten of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover themes of lasting legacy, family wealth, generational abundance, and retirement with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: emotional message, creative spark, intuition, inner child, romantic proposal
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You once nurtured a creative dream or an innocent crush that shaped your emotional landscape. That past gentleness is the foundation of your current empathy.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: Something new and delightful is bubbling up! Whether it's a creative idea or a fluttering feeling, be open to the unexpected surprises the universe is sending your way.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: A message of joy or an artistic opportunity is en route. The future invites you to embrace your inner child‚Äîplay, laugh, and believe in magic again.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past sensitivity leads to a present emotional message, blossoming into a future filled with creative expression and joyful beginnings.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: An innocent past crush or a puppy love that was sweet and uncomplicated.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: A younger admirer may appear, or you might receive a sweet, heartfelt message that makes you smile.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: A new romance will begin with sweetness and charm, or a gentle reconciliation is on the horizon.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You had creative ideas you were too shy to share, or pursued art as a quiet hobby.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: Trust your intuition! That 'crazy' creative idea might actually be your next big success.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Good news regarding a job application is coming, or a chance to start a creative career path.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You spent money emotionally on cute things that brought joy but had little utility.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Expect a small windfall or a thoughtful gift. Don't stress too much about hard numbers right now.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Income will flow from doing what you love or artistic endeavors; money follows joy.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Listen to your heart and dare to do something silly, cute, or creatively spontaneous.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: If the fish in the cup could talk, what secret message would it have for you?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I open my heart to the sweet surprises of the universe.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Is there a fish in your coffee? Cute surprises are waiting for you!
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Pour water into a beautiful glass. Gaze into it, whisper a wish about love or creativity into the water, and drink it slowly to internalize that energy.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What was the last dream I remember clearly?
How can I show gentleness to myself today?
What is one creative idea I want to play with, just for fun?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: creativity, intuition, message, romance, sensitivity, innocence
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: moodiness, immaturity, emotional block, bad news, unrealistic dreams
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A whimsical young cat wearing a beret and a colorful tunic, holding a golden cup with a small blue fish popping its head out to say hello, beach background.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A whimsical young cat with wide curious eyes, wearing a colorful artistic tunic and a beret, standing by the seashore, holding a golden chalice from which a friendly blue fish is popping out to chat, soft pastel colors, dreamy atmosphere, Tarot Art Nouveau style.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Page of Cups tarot meaning. Discover messages of love, intuitive sparks, and creative beginnings with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.hook_en: The white horse is here. Are you ready to ride off into the sunset?
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Write a love letter to yourself (or your dream partner) on beautiful paper. Place it under your pillow for one night to invite romantic energy into your life.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
If my life were a romance movie, what scene is this?
How can I add a touch of romance to my daily routine?
What is the dream I most want to manifest right now?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: romance, charm, proposal, creativity, beauty, following heart
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A dashing white cat riding a seahorse through gentle waves, holding a golden chalice forward as if making a toast. The mood is dreamy and soft.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A dashing white Angora cat riding a large mystical seahorse through soft turquoise ocean waves, holding a golden cup forward in a gesture of offering, wearing a winged helmet, dreamy pastel sunset background, Tarot Art Nouveau style, romantic atmosphere.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Knight of Cups tarot meaning. Discover themes of romance, emotional offers, following your heart, and creative inspiration with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: romance, following the heart, emotional offer, imagination, charm
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You followed your heart rather than your head, pursuing a dream or a feeling with abandon. This taught you the beauty and the ache of deep emotion.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: The mood is turning pink! A new opportunity or person is approaching with a charming offer. You are currently swept up in imagination and good vibes.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Your journey to follow your heart's calling will lead to emotional fulfillment. Don't be afraid to be a dreamer, for those dreams are manifesting.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Your history of following your heart has made you receptive to the charming offers present now, leading to a future of deep emotional fulfillment.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: You were a hopeless romantic, diving headfirst into love, or were swept off your feet by a charmer.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: Prince(ss) Charming is arriving! This is a time of courtship, dating, and feeling like you're walking on air.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: The relationship will evolve into something deeply romantic and spiritually meaningful.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You prioritized passion over paycheck, or followed a creative calling in your career.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: An appealing job offer is on the table, or your creativity is flowing effortlessly at work.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Follow your passion and you will thrive. Careers in art, beauty, or healing are favored.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You spent money on experiences or beautiful things that fed your soul.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Finances are flowing, but likely flowing out for social events or dates. Enjoy, but keep track.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Income will generate from what you love, or a pleasant financial surprise awaits.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Use your charm; dare to be romantic and express your feelings openly.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Is what you are chasing true love, or just a fantasy you've created?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I dare to follow the call of my heart.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: The white horse is here. Are you ready to ride off into the sunset?
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Write a love letter to yourself (or your dream partner) on beautiful paper. Place it under your pillow for one night to invite romantic energy into your life.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
If my life were a romance movie, what scene is this?
How can I add a touch of romance to my daily routine?
What is the dream I most want to manifest right now?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: romance, charm, proposal, creativity, beauty, following heart
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A dashing white cat riding a seahorse through gentle waves, holding a golden chalice forward as if making a toast. The mood is dreamy and soft.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A dashing white Angora cat riding a large mystical seahorse through soft turquoise ocean waves, holding a golden cup forward in a gesture of offering, wearing a winged helmet, dreamy pastel sunset background, Tarot Art Nouveau style, romantic atmosphere.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Knight of Cups tarot meaning. Discover themes of romance, emotional offers, following your heart, and creative inspiration with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: empathy, intuition, emotional healing, compassion, emotional intelligence
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have served as an emotional anchor for others, using gentleness to navigate difficulties. The compassion you extended in the past has shaped your spiritual depth.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: Your intuition is razor-sharp right now! This is the time to nurture your own emotions and those of others. Trust your gut feelings; they are your best compass.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: You are moving toward a state of true emotional maturity and stability. You may find yourself in a position to heal or counsel others using your natural gifts.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past compassion has built a stable emotional foundation today, and trusting your intuition will lead you to a future role of a wise healer.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: You were the source of unconditional love, using immense patience and understanding to nurture a connection.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: The relationship is filled with empathy; you and your partner can communicate deeply on a soul level.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: A warm, safe love awaits. You will be the emotional 'home' for the right person, who will deeply value your tenderness.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You were often trusted to handle people dynamics or tasks requiring emotional sensitivity.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: Use 'soft power' at work. Listening and kindness will solve problems more effectively than authority.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Careers in healing, counseling, or expressive arts will be particularly prosperous for you.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You helped others financially out of compassion or spent resources on family well-being.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Trust your intuition with money. If an investment feels 'off', back away; if it feels right, proceed.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Financial stability will come with emotional peace; you will have enough to share and help others.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Trust your first instinct and extend kindness to someone who is struggling.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you taking care of the world's heart while neglecting your own?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: My heart is a wellspring of compassion and healing.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: The brain calculates, but the heart knows.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Take a warm bath or a foot soak with salt. Visualize the water washing away emotional heaviness, leaving you clear, calm, and refreshed.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What emotion have I been suppressing that needs release?
How can I be kinder to myself today?
What is my intuition trying to warn me about?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: compassion, calm, intuition, healing, comfort, emotional security
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A serene white cat with blue eyes sitting on a throne by the sea, gazing lovingly at an ornate golden cup held in its paws.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A serene white fluffy cat with deep blue eyes sitting on a shell-encrusted throne at the edge of a calm misty sea, holding an ornate golden grail with both paws, soft moonlight reflecting on the water, ethereal atmosphere, Tarot Art Nouveau style, dreamlike.
#E0FFFF
#87CEEB
#C0C0C0
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Queen of Cups tarot meaning. Discover themes of intuition, emotional healing, compassion, and the power of empathy with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: emotional balance, diplomacy, wisdom, compassion, emotional control
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have mastered significant lessons in emotional management, navigating past storms with understanding, which has built the strong psychological foundation you have today.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: You are the calm captain amidst the storm. No matter how chaotic the surroundings, you maintain control of the situation with composure and empathy. You are in a place of peak emotional maturity, able to handle challenges with serenity and be a reliable anchor for others.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Your role will evolve into that of a counselor or a heart-led leader. Your composure will command respect and lead to success.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past experiences have forged your current stability. You are an emotional anchor, and in the future, you will use this wisdom to guide and support others.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: You were the one who exercised great patience and understanding to sustain a relationship.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: Love is stable and mature. You and your partner use reason alongside emotion to solve problems, avoiding impulsive reactions.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: You will meet someone with high emotional intelligence, or your current relationship will deepen into profound peace and understanding.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You previously played the role of a mediator or advisor, helping to resolve workplace conflicts.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: Success comes from psychology and diplomacy. Being a leader who truly listens will ensure smooth operations.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Careers in counseling, psychiatry, or negotiation will thrive. You will be recognized as a visionary with deep insight.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You managed money mindfully, never letting impulsive emotions tear a hole in your pocket.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Financial status is stable due to moderation and discipline; you can afford to help others reasonably.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Prudent financial decisions made today will build sustainable and safe wealth for tomorrow.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Take a deep breath, step back, and view the situation with the eyes of a compassionate observer.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you mastering your emotions, or just suppressing them to hide them from others?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I am the master of my own emotions.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: No matter how rough the waves, a calm captain cannot be shaken.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Meditate briefly, visualizing yourself as the vast ocean. While waves may chop the surface, the deep water below remains perfectly still and silent.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
In what situations do I tend to lose emotional control?
How can I bring peace to the conflict I am currently facing?
Who is my role model for 'composure'?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: emotional balance, diplomacy, wisdom, counseling, tolerance
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: manipulation, moodiness, emotional detachment, deceit, addiction
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A wise, calm cat sitting on a stone throne in the middle of a turbulent ocean, holding a cup without spilling a drop, wearing a blue cape.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A wise and majestic Maine Coon cat sitting calmly on a granite throne floating in the middle of a choppy dark blue ocean, holding a golden chalice steady with no spills, wearing a royal blue cape, stormy sky clearing up above, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of command.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the King of Cups tarot meaning. Discover themes of emotional balance, wisdom, diplomacy, and mastering your feelings with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.hook_en: Curiosity isn't a crime... but are you ready for the answer?
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Stand in a breezy spot outdoors. Close your eyes and visualize the wind blowing away mental fog. Inhale deeply to invite clarity and fresh ideas.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What have I been curious about but afraid to ask?
What piece of information am I missing to make this decision?
How can I use my observation skills to my advantage today?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: curiosity, mental energy, vigilance, agility, truth-seeking
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: gossip, paranoia, rudeness, hasty speech, spying
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A young, alert Abyssinian cat standing on a windy green hill, holding a silver sword upright with its paws, clouds rushing by in a blue sky.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A young alert Abyssinian cat standing on a windy grassy hill, holding a silver sword upright with paws, purple butterflies fluttering around, clouds rushing by in a bright blue sky, energetic atmosphere, Tarot Art Nouveau style, dynamic composition.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Page of Swords tarot meaning. Discover themes of curiosity, mental vigilance, seeking the truth, and receiving news with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: curiosity, vigilance, mental agility, investigation, truthful messages
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You were driven by an insatiable curiosity, questioning everything, or perhaps navigated a time where you had to be extremely guarded with your words.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: Your inner detective is wide awake! You are observing your surroundings with eagle-eyed vigilance, ready to absorb new information and use your wit to solve immediate problems.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Important news or fresh ideas are blowing your way like a sudden gust of wind. You will need to use your sharp intellect to decide and communicate with absolute candor.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past inquisitiveness has evolved into present vigilance and wit, preparing you to handle upcoming news or changes with swift mental agility.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: A relationship defined by intellectual sparring or perhaps quietly observing your partner's moves.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: Beware of social media stalking or a relationship where both parties are guarded and watching each other's moves.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: News regarding a partner will arrive, or a conversation will occur that brings a hidden truth to light.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You had to learn the ropes quickly or worked in a role requiring heavy data analysis and research.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: It's time to utilize your negotiation and research skills. Your ideas are solid, but they need smart presentation.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: A new contract or an opportunity to learn a skill that advances your career is on the horizon.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You researched investments heavily or were cautious with spending due to uncertainty.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Double-check the numbers before paying. Don't trust hearsay; verify the facts yourself.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Economic news will impact your wallet; having a contingency plan based on facts is best.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Keep your eyes and ears open; gather all the facts first before making a final judgment.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you looking for the truth, or just looking for something to confirm what you already think?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: My mind is sharp, and I have the courage to face the truth.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Curiosity isn't a crime... but are you ready for the answer?
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Stand in a breezy spot outdoors. Close your eyes and visualize the wind blowing away mental fog. Inhale deeply to invite clarity and fresh ideas.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What have I been curious about but afraid to ask?
What piece of information am I missing to make this decision?
How can I use my observation skills to my advantage today?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: curiosity, mental energy, vigilance, agility, truth-seeking
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: gossip, paranoia, rudeness, hasty speech, spying
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A young, alert Abyssinian cat standing on a windy green hill, holding a silver sword upright with its paws, clouds rushing by in a blue sky.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A young alert Abyssinian cat standing on a windy grassy hill, holding a silver sword upright with paws, purple butterflies fluttering around, clouds rushing by in a bright blue sky, energetic atmosphere, Tarot Art Nouveau style, dynamic composition.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Page of Swords tarot meaning. Discover themes of curiosity, mental vigilance, seeking the truth, and receiving news with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: ambition, swift action, determination, impatience, charging forward
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You previously charged headfirst into a situation, driven by a strong conviction or intellectual ambition, perhaps learning the hard way that speed can cause collisions.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: Engines are roaring! You are sharp, focused, and ready to cut through obstacles. Just be careful not to rush so fast that you trip over your own feet.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Brace for impact and rapid change. Events will unfold at lightning speed, requiring you to make split-second decisions without hesitation.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past determination fuels your current ability to cut through noise swiftly, leading to a future of rapid advancement that demands quick wit.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: A whirlwind romance that started (and maybe ended) quickly, or a period of sharp words and intellectual conflict.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: The dynamic is intellectual but blunt. Honesty is high, but tact might be missing.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: Watch out for conflicts born of impatience. However, logical communication will resolve issues swiftly.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You worked aggressively to prove yourself, cutting through red tape and exhausting yourself in the process.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: Close the deal now! The situation demands decisive action and immediate execution, not endless meetings.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Rapid advancement is coming. Prepare for a challenging project that requires top-tier mental agility.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You made quick financial moves in the past, leading to either fast gains or jarring losses.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Financial opportunities are fleeting‚Äîstrike while the iron is hot, but keep your eyes open.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Beware of sudden expenses or high-risk, high-reward investments appearing on your radar.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Don't hesitate; make the cut and charge forward with confidence immediately.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you charging towards a goal, or running away from a truth?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I think fast, act fast, and reach my goals with precision.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: If you wait for all the lights to turn green, you'll never leave the driveway. Go!
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Stand firmly and throw 10 fast punches into the air. Visualize your fists shattering obstacles and hesitation with every strike.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What decision do I already know the answer to but am hesitating to execute?
If I had zero fear, what would be my first move?
What truth needs to be spoken to clear the air?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: ambition, action, directness, logic, authority, speed
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A sleek, determined cat in silver armor riding a gust of wind, holding a sword forward, ears flattened back from the speed.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A sleek silver tabby cat wearing light aerodynamic armor, riding a fierce gust of wind through stormy clouds, holding a glowing silver sword pointed forward, intense focus in eyes, motion blur, dynamic action shot, Tarot Art Nouveau style.
#C0C0C0
#DC143C
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Knight of Swords tarot meaning. Discover themes of ambition, swift action, determination, and mental agility with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: clarity, boundaries, sharp wit, independence, honesty
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have learned the hard way that vulnerability can be risky. Past experiences taught you to build emotional armor and rely on cold, hard logic to survive.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: No more tears; it's time for truth. You see right through the illusions and are ready to cut out any nonsense or toxicity from your life without hesitation.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Armed with wit and clarity, you will achieve total independence. You will be respected as someone who speaks the truth and sees what others miss.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past hardships forged your current resilience. You are now using sharp logic to cut through confusion, leading to a future of independence built on truth.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: You were hurt enough to build walls, choosing to walk away from irrational or toxic love.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: You demand clarity! You need a partner who meets you on an intellectual level, not emotional drama.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: You will find a love that respects your boundaries and mind, or you will happily choose elegant solitude.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You built your reputation on professionalism and directness, avoiding office politics.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: Precision and clear communication are key. Make decisions based on data, not feelings.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: You will become a respected leader known for fairness, sharp insight, and high standards.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You had to make ruthless cuts to your budget in the past to survive.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Spending is purely logical right now. Frivolous items are cut; value is priority.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Rigorous planning will ensure your financial status remains secure and transparent.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Speak your truth directly but politely. Cut away whatever is weighing you down.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you using logic to solve problems, or to block your own heart?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I speak my truth with clarity and wisdom.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: The truth might sting, but lies will kill the vibe.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Stand tall. Visualize holding a blue light sword. Mentally slash through the cords of confusion or fear binding you, and declare, 'I am free.'
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What truth do I know but am afraid to speak?
What boundary do I need to draw clearly right now?
How can I be more brutally honest with myself?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: clarity, honesty, independence, wit, boundaries, logic
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: coldness, cruelty, bitterness, overly critical, isolation
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A sleek, regal Siamese cat sitting upright on a stone throne, holding a sword vertically. The sky behind is clearing up after a storm.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A regal Siamese cat with piercing blue eyes sitting on a high stone throne, holding a silver sword upright in one paw, clouds clearing to reveal a crisp blue sky in the background, sharp details, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of clarity.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Queen of Swords tarot meaning. Discover themes of clarity, honesty, independence, and setting healthy boundaries with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.hook_en: Feelings are fleeting, but the truth is forever.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Sit quietly and write down your problem. Cross out every sentence that describes an 'emotion' until only the 'facts' remain. Solve based on that list.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What standard in my life is non-negotiable?
How can I be brutally honest without being brutal?
What does true justice look like to me right now?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: intellect, authority, truth, discipline, integrity, structure
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A stern, majestic cat sitting on a high throne of stone, holding a sword upright, with a backdrop of clear skies and distant mountains.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A majestic Russian Blue cat with a stern expression, sitting on a geometric stone throne high in the mountains, holding a glowing steel sword upright, butterflies turning into birds in the clear sky, sharp focus, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of intellectual power.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the King of Swords tarot meaning. Discover themes of intellectual authority, objective truth, logic, and ethical leadership with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: intellectual authority, objective truth, ethical leadership, stern logic, clear judgment
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have navigated complex intellectual battles and difficult decisions. Your adherence to principles and logic in the past has established your current authority and respect.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: It is time to assume the role of the impartial judge. You must set aside personal emotions, look at the cold hard facts, and make the decision that logic dictates.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Your success relies on strategic planning and professionalism. You are destined to reach the pinnacle of your field through intellect and expertise.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past discipline set high standards for your present. Applying sharp logic and objective judgment now is the key to your future leadership and authority.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: You prioritized logic over emotion in past relationships, or perhaps maintained a distance that made you hard to reach.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: Love requires clarity and intellect right now. You need a partner who is your mental equal and shares your ethical standards.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: A stable relationship awaits, but it must be built on a foundation of mutual respect and absolute honesty.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You climbed the ladder through sheer competence and intellect, relying on merit rather than luck or connections.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: You are in a leadership position requiring critical decisions. Be decisive, fair, and forward-thinking.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Higher positions with greater responsibility are coming. You will be sought after as a top advisor or expert authority.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: Strict discipline and organized financial management helped you survive past crises.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Apply ironclad rules to your finances. Cut unnecessary expenses logically; do not emotional spend.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Wealth will come through savvy planning involving taxes, law, or knowledge-based investments.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Let your head rule your heart. Make decisions based on data and ethics, not pity.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Is the truth you are speaking both useful and timely?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I lead with integrity and a sharp, clear mind.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Feelings are fleeting, but the truth is forever.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Sit quietly and write down your problem. Cross out every sentence that describes an 'emotion' until only the 'facts' remain. Solve based on that list.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What standard in my life is non-negotiable?
How can I be brutally honest without being brutal?
What does true justice look like to me right now?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: intellect, authority, truth, discipline, integrity, structure
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A stern, majestic cat sitting on a high throne of stone, holding a sword upright, with a backdrop of clear skies and distant mountains.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A majestic Russian Blue cat with a stern expression, sitting on a geometric stone throne high in the mountains, holding a glowing steel sword upright, butterflies turning into birds in the clear sky, sharp focus, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of intellectual power.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the King of Swords tarot meaning. Discover themes of intellectual authority, objective truth, logic, and ethical leadership with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: new study, financial opportunity, diligence, practical news, manifestation
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You recently sparked an interest in a new subject or started a small financial plan, laying the necessary groundwork for your current growth.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: Opportunities are sprouting from the ground up! Whether it's an internship, a scholarship, or a new way to earn, success now requires study and attention to detail.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: The effort you put into learning today will manifest as tangible success tomorrow. You are on the path to becoming a master of your craft with solid rewards.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past curiosity has led to a present opportunity requiring diligence, which will ultimately blossom into tangible future success and stability.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: A relationship that began with simplicity, loyalty, and a slow, steady pace.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: It's a time of studying each other; the romance may be quiet, but it is grounded, loyal, and sincere.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: The connection will mature into a lasting bond, with serious practical planning for a shared future.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You started as a diligent intern or beginner, willing to work hard to gain valuable skills.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: A new project or training opportunity is here. Don't shy away from the grunt work; you are leveling up.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: The skills you are mastering now will become your ticket to a stable career and higher income.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You started saving small amounts or began educating yourself about investments.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Good news regarding a small sum is coming, or you'll find a side hustle that requires hands-on effort.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Investing in your own knowledge will yield the highest returns; your wealth will grow with your diligence.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Stay humble, be open to learning new things, and pay close attention to the small details.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: What specific skill do you need to learn right now to reach your goal?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I am dedicated to learning and building my abundance step by step.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Wealth starts with wisdom. Are you ready to open the book?
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Hold a coin tightly in your hand. Close your eyes and visualize it glowing with golden light, infusing you with focus. Set an intention for a successful new beginning.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the one new subject I want to master this year?
How can I carve out time daily for self-improvement?
What is the most tangible result I want to see in 3 months?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: ambition, diligence, study, opportunity, focus, practicality
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: procrastination, lack of progress, greed, shortsightedness, laziness
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A young, studious cat wearing a green scarf, standing in a lush meadow, examining a floating golden pentacle with a magnifying glass.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A curious young tabby cat wearing a scholarly green scarf, standing in a blooming clover field, intensely examining a glowing golden coin floating in front of it with a vintage magnifying glass, soft sunlight, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of discovery.
#FFD700
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Page of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover themes of new study, career opportunities, diligence, and practical beginnings with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: responsibility, patience, hard work, reliability, steady progress
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have been consistent and hardworking throughout your journey. Your current success is not due to luck, but the result of your own sweat and patience.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: Life might feel like a repetitive routine right now, but rest assured you are on the right track. Consistency is key; do not get bored with the grind just yet.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: Your goals will be achieved 100%. It might be slow, but it is guaranteed. You will receive rewards that fully justify your waiting and dedication.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past diligence has built a solid foundation for your present. Maintaining this consistency now ensures a future of tangible and lasting success.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: A relationship that was smooth but perhaps a bit dull, prioritizing stability over excitement.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: Your partner might seem quiet or work-focused, but they are loyal and reliable. You are building a life together.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: The relationship will proceed steadily towards a long-term commitment; a true partnership in building a life.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You were the reliable employee everyone trusted, known for detailed work and never abandoning a task.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: The workload is heavy and requires detail, but you can handle it easily. Just stick to the plan step-by-step.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Your consistent performance will impress superiors, leading to bigger responsibilities or a promotion.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: Saving little by little in the past has given you a comforting financial cushion.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Finances are stable. Focus is on saving and low-risk investments; not exciting, but very safe.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Your wealth will grow steadily over time. Long-term investments will yield satisfying returns.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Stick strictly to the plan. Slow and steady is better than rushing and crashing.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you bored by the routine, or proud of your discipline?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I finish what I start with excellence.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Slow and steady wins the race... and keeps the prize.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Write down 3 tasks for today. Complete them one by one. Cross them off with a red pen to physically mark your concrete achievement.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What daily routine makes me feel like I'm making progress?
How can I add a little joy to my repetitive tasks?
Which project requires more patience from me right now?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: efficiency, routine, conservatism, reliability, method, hard work
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A sturdy Tabby cat wearing leather work gear, sitting on a black plow-horse in a plowed field, holding a golden pentacle and examining the soil.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A sturdy brown Tabby cat wearing leather work gear, sitting on a black plow-horse in a plowed field, holding a golden pentacle, examining the soil, earthy colors, harvest background, Tarot Art Nouveau style, intricate details.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Knight of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover themes of hard work, reliability, routine, and steady progress with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: nurturing abundance, domestic security, practical care, earthy generosity, financial management
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You have played the role of the devoted provider, tirelessly building a foundation of security and comfort for those around you.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: You are currently the ultimate manager of life's practicalities. Money, home, and comfort are firmly in your capable hands; your warmth is your superpower.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: A prosperous future awaits where you enjoy the comforts of life. You will have ample resources to care for yourself and your loved ones without worry.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Your past dedication to nurturing has built the solid stability you enjoy today, positioning you as a pillar of strength that ensures a future of abundance and reliability.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: You were the nurturing partner, often taking on a caregiver role to ensure your loved one felt safe and warm.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: Love is expressed through practical acts of service, like cooking a good meal or helping manage shared finances.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: Building a warm, secure family life is the goal; your home will be a sanctuary of happiness and abundance.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You worked with high responsibility, often being the supportive backbone that ensured the team's success.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: You are mastering the work-life balance, managing professional tasks efficiently while keeping the vibe grounded.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: A business of your own or a career focused on service and care will generate significant income.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: You have always been prudent with money, saving wisely and spending only on what brings true value.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Financial health is excellent! You can afford to treat yourself and spoil your loved ones without stress.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Wealth will be sustained and lasting; you will secure assets and stability to pass on to the next generation.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Nurture your own body and soul with the same care you give to others.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Are you so busy taking care of the world that you've forgotten to water your own inner garden?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I attract abundance through love, warmth, and practicality.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Practical magic: looking good, feeling good, and having money in the bank.
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Cook a favorite meal or arrange fresh flowers. Focus on the textures and scents to ground yourself and connect with the energy of earthy abundance.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What self-care act makes me feel most emotionally 'wealthy'?
How can I create a warmer, more welcoming atmosphere at home?
What abundance can I share with others today?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: nurturing, practical, wealthy, generous, secure, home-loving
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: smothering, materialistic, neglectful of self, hoarding, anxious
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A warm, motherly cat sitting in a lush garden filled with flowers and rabbits, holding a golden coin lovingly like a child.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A warm, motherly Calico cat sitting on a mossy throne in a sun-drenched garden, surrounded by blooming roses and cute rabbits, holding a large golden pentacle lovingly in her lap, earthy and abundant atmosphere, Tarot Art Nouveau style.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the Queen of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover themes of nurturing abundance, domestic security, practical care, and financial wellbeing with MeowTarot.

orientation_label_th.tarot_imply_en: ultimate wealth, business success, stability, reliable leadership, abundance
orientation_label_th.standalone_past_en: You built a rock-solid foundation through hard work and prudent decisions. Your past successes are the sturdy throne upon which you now sit.
orientation_label_th.standalone_present_en: You sit at the top of the food chain! It is time to enjoy your success and use your influence and resources to expand your empire or care for your pride.
orientation_label_th.standalone_future_en: A secure and wealthy future awaits. You are destined to become an influential figure capable of leaving a grand legacy for generations to come.
orientation_label_th.reading_summary_preview_en: Past diligence forged your current throne of success, and wise management now ensures a future of sustainable, legendary wealth.
orientation_label_th.love_past_en: A relationship grounded in practicality, stability, or social standing rather than just passion.
orientation_label_th.love_present_en: You and your partner are building an empire together, or you may have found a provider who loves to spoil you.
orientation_label_th.love_future_en: A stable marriage and a prosperous family life filled with material comfort are on the horizon.
orientation_label_th.career_past_en: You climbed the ladder through sheer competence and patience, earning high-level respect.
orientation_label_th.career_present_en: You are the boss! Whether a business owner or executive, you have the Midas touch to lead your team to profit.
orientation_label_th.career_future_en: Ultimate career peak, business expansion, or becoming an influential mentor in your industry.
orientation_label_th.finance_past_en: Smart investments and tight financial planning in the past have resulted in your current wealth.
orientation_label_th.finance_present_en: Financial status is rock solid. Cash flow is abundant, and assets are significant.
orientation_label_th.finance_future_en: Becoming a tycoon or achieving permanent financial freedom that secures your lineage.
orientation_label_th.action_prompt_en: Think big like a king; manage resources efficiently and be generous to your people.
orientation_label_th.reflection_question_en: Now that you have everything, how will you use your power to benefit the world?
orientation_label_th.affirmation_en: I attract ultimate wealth and success with ease.
orientation_label_th.hook_en: Ready to live like a fat cat? This card says you're the king of the castle!
orientation_label_th.ritual_2min_en: Sit in your most comfortable chair. Close your eyes, visualize wearing a golden crown, and feel the weight of a giant coin in your hand. Breathe in the feeling of absolute stability and power.
orientation_label_th.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What does ultimate success look like to me?
How can I use my money to bring joy to those around me?
What is the next step to expand my empire?
orientation_label_th.keywords_light: abundance, prosperity, security, reliability, business acumen, discipline
orientation_label_th.keywords_shadow: greed, materialism, stubbornness, obsession with wealth, dullness
orientation_label_th.image_alt_en: A majestic Maine Coon cat sitting on an ornate stone throne decorated with bull carvings, holding a golden scepter and a large glowing pentacle coin, surrounded by lush vineyards.
orientation_label_th.illustration_prompt_en: A majestic Maine Coon cat king sitting on an ornate stone throne decorated with bull carvings, holding a golden scepter and a large glowing pentacle coin, surrounded by lush vineyards and castles in the background, warm golden hour lighting, Tarot Art Nouveau style, atmosphere of wealth and power.
orientation_label_th.meta_description_en: Explore the King of Pentacles tarot meaning. Discover themes of ultimate wealth, business success, financial stability, and reliable leadership with MeowTarot.
